product_name: Pearl Izumi Select Soft-Shell Bike Shoe Covers
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Select Softshell bike shoe covers set the benchmark for affordable protection from the elements when riding on cool days. Select soft-shell fabric keeps feet cozy and protected from windchill. Durable Kevlar(R) soles that spread open and rear rip-and-stick closure offer easy on and off. Tall cuffs cover skin between shoe tops and tights. Anatomic paneling offers a performance fit; reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi recommends Select Soft-Shell bike shoe covers for road shoes with external cleats.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi Select Softshell bike shoe covers set the benchmark for affordable protection from the elements when riding on cool days.
